thread.title: Family visit to NY - Review
thread.title_full: Family visit to NY - Review of The Marmara Manhattan, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Jackie H
title: Family visit to NY - Review
text: WOW, what a fabulous place to stay, We are a family of 6 from Aust, 2 adults and 4 children and we couldn't recommend the Marmara more highly, We had 7 wonderful nights exploring NYC and it was made even better by our very spacious, clean and comfy 2 bed apt, The supermarkets are around the corner with restaurants everywhere, the Subway a 10 min walk and Central Park an easy 25 min walk. Enjoy!!!
